articles.title: Imaging technique captures ultrafast electron and atom dynamics in chemical reactions - Phys.org
articles.description: During chemical reactions, atoms in the reacting substances break their bonds and re-arrange, forming different chemical products. This process entails the movement of both electrons (i.e., negatively charged particles) and nuclei (i.e., the positively charge…

articles.title: 10 breakthrough technologies to expect in 2026 : Short Wave - NPR
